properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS 0800Z TO 1700Z DAILY
   UNTIL 23 JUL BY M/V RAISA II IN AREA BOUND BY
   03-43.71S 038-27.08W, 03-44.33S 038-27.08W,
   03-43.81S 038-25.71W, 03-43.15S 038-26.02W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 231800Z JUL 20.
